dict.acceptation: 委员会；（郡、镇等）政务会；（尤指旧时讨论特定步骤的）协商会议；市政（或地方管理）服务机构；

sent.orig: The President of the Legislative Council is elected by, and from among, members of the council.
sent.trans: 立法会主席由立法会议员互选一人出任。

sent.orig: The Congregation Council is under the leadership of the Council Chairperson.
sent.trans: 教会执事部由执事部主席带领。

sent.orig: Even the chairman of the council has no right to make decisions for the council.
sent.trans: 理事长也没有权力代替理事会做出决定。

sent.orig: We've got the go-ahead from the council/The council have given (us) the go-ahead to start building.
sent.trans: 我们已得到市政会的准许[市政会已准许我们]开工建。

sent.orig: Meetings of council are held in the council chamber.
sent.trans: 理事会会议在会议室举行。
